div.span: It is with great sadness that this year's Prom has been canceled due to Covid-19. We were hoping for things to ease up, but under the current guidelines it is just not possible.

div.a: Changes to East Chambers Free Meals for Children Program Announced

div.span: EC is still offering free meals for all kids under the age of 18. Drive-thru pickup available outside the Dome Cafeteria/Shelter. 7:15-10:00 We will serve a hot breakfast and a cold lunch. 11:00-1:00 we will serve a cold breakfast and a hot lunch. 4:30-5:30 we will serve a hot supper. ...
